product_name: Goldcoast The Valve Drop Thru Longboard
long_description: The Goldcoast The Valve Drop Thru longboard is made for fast hill descents, sliding corners, or simply cruising around town. 9-ply Canadian maple deck features a drop-through deck design to avoid wheel bite, and a concave "W" shape for stability and control. Features Goldcoast A7 ball bearings and Century 179mm reverse pivot trucks with 90A Goldcoast bushings. Shred boot 70mm, 85a wheels provide excellent carve, downhill, slide and urban-commuting performance; they help manage speed, drifting and high-powered turning. Die-cut grip tape for traction.
short_description: The Goldcoast The Valve Drop Thru longboard is made for fast hill descents, sliding corners, or simply cruising around town.
